title: Masked Student Gets ROCKED by Ben Shapiro | @YAFTV
description:
While debating at a recent YAF event, Ben faced off against a student that was unwilling to show their face, due to the nature (and stupidity) of their question. If you're going to make a statement about something, say it confidently. 

Watch the full event here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LUq2d3-kViY

title: Ben Talks Snow White, Disney and Bentkey with The Critical Drinker
description:
I joined the infamous @TheCriticalDrinker to have a chat about @Bentkeyofficial rendition of Snow White, Disney's continuous ball-dropping of all things good and pure, and what to expect from Bentkey in the future.

Watch the full conversation here: https://youtu.be/N5jViRrsYyY?si=dN_RA19ltm3spO-H
